Use the prompt below with Gemini (Imagen 3) or other AI image generators to create the `1280x640px` social preview image for this repository.

## The Prompt

> **Prompt:**
> "A professional, modern social preview image for a GitHub repository software project named 'Core CMS'. Dimensions 1280x640.
>
> **Visual Style:**
> *   **Background:** Deep navy blue (`#1c2a38`) with a subtle, abstract technical grid or circuit pattern to represent the 'Core' architecture.
> *   **Centerpiece:** A glowing, stylized gold (`#d4af37`) 5-point star contained within a geometric circle, representing the 'Solar Plexus' or the core of the system.
> *   **Typography:** Large, bold, modern sans-serif text on the right or center reading 'Core CMS' in white.
> *   **Tagline:** Smaller text below reading 'Lightweight. Modular. AI-Ready.'
> *   **Vibe:** Clean, secure, developer-focused, high-quality vector art style."

## Usage
1.  Generate the image.
2.  Save as `assets/images/social-preview.png` (or similar).
3.  Upload to GitHub Repository Settings > General > Social Preview.
